subject: information about plus x pedal
description_text:
Hi ,
i’m interested in the plus x pedal and i want to know if i can use them with the thrustmaster t818. Also i want to know if buying the newest plus x i can instantly use them or if i have to buy something else to make them work ( like power supply or mounting bracket).
thanks 
Edoardo Strazzera

conversations.body_text: Hi Edoardo Strazzera,  If it’s a PC game, our pedals are compatible with any other brand’s wheel base, as they all work via USB connection to the PC, ensuring full compatibility. Additionally, if you don’t need the haptic motors, no extra power supply is required—the pedals come with a USB cable and all necessary screws, wrenches, and installation accessories.
